events.message: I received the phone yesterday and noticed a deep scratch on the screen. I am very disappointed with the damage on arrival.
The reported issue involves a product defect due to a scratch found on the phone screen upon delivery.
Your case has been assigned to our support agent to assist you with the product defect issue.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your phone screen. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please send us photos of the scratch and any packaging damage so we can better understand the issue?
I have attached several pictures of the scratched screen and the box, which also shows some dents. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement device free of charge or a full refund. Please confirm which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement phone instead of a refund. Thank you for your quick response and help.
The replacement has been processed and will be shipped to your address within 3 business days. We appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement phone and everything is in good condition now.
Yes, I received the replacement device today and it is perfect. Thank you so much for your excellent support.
We are glad your issue was resolved to your satisfaction. We are closing this case now, and please reach out if you need any further assistance.
